tags: None
review: Dr Ranjith is hearing patients query quietly and investigate to find the actual problem causing for knee pain. If needed only Dr suggests xray to find out root cause. Based on finding Dr has given *********** treatment to my mum in very professional manner.

tags: None
review:
I had a erratic pain in my shoulder and couldn't lie on bed for more than 3 hours. This spoils my sleep and my shoulder locks in making me static and I can't move a bit after it is locked. It automatically releases the lock but leaves me with severe pain.

Doctor was very kind. Gives enough time for you to explain your problem. Does a brief diagnosis of your problem. Most important of all, he has the courtesy to listen to you completely. When a doctor listens, you feel half the pain come down.

He asked me to twist my arms in different directions. Then gave me two options to find the exact issue. Whether to take X-ray or to take a Scan directly. He also told that the scan shall straight away reveal your problem but X-ray shall or shall not. This would help me reduce the cost of going again and again. Being this transparent is much appreciated than asking me to take X-ray and then again call me for scan.

He also explained the clear consequences of this pain and what it shall lead to. He suggested me few immediate precautions to be taken that shall reduce the pain.

I started following those precautions and now feeling a lot better. He is the first doctor who has not suggested me any pills till any diagnosis has been done. This shall be well appreciated. 

Thank you Dr Ranjit and I thank God for meeting you at this point of time.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Really  feeling better after having consulted and followed the medications as per doctor's prescription. Also the doctor does not go for any advance level diagnosis and in turn the treatment. He is very particular in diagnosing step by step. On the whole, I'm very satisfied with the way I'm treated.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: A very humble and polite doctor.. Dr Ranjith properly explained my problem and the treatment plan.. I was quite apprehensive but the doctor and the friendly environment of his clinic made me comfortable... I highly recommend Dr.Ranjith for any orthopedic problems...

tags: Value for money,
review: I have been taking medicines since the past 2 days and it works. The doctor proceeds with a methodical diagnosis and listens to the problem statement with due care. This is my first visit and I m confident that Ranjith will be able to solve the riddle. Good part of the story is that he doesn't jump to the solution but waits for a detailed analysis to arrive at the solution. Appreciate it.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Ranjith paid full attention to listen my problem .After thorough check recommended the coarse of actions. Advised do's and don'ts. Very kind and nice meeting.
The clinic was very neat and comfortable.The in house medical shop staff was also very kind and clearly wrote when to take the medicine on the cover itself.

tags: None
review: I was suffering from severe knee pain following injury.I was suggested by my friend to this doctor.he examined my knee and suggested scan followed by medications.after seeing my reports he suggested surgery for my left knee.initially I was scared about surgery but the doctor explained to me in details with figures and the total procedure how it b done.After hearing that I got convinced and got my surgery done 2 weeks ago.after surgery he has given me some exercise to do reguralry..now my pain has subsided and I'm very happy  about it..I would totally recommend u to this doctor

tags: None
review:
I have undergone SLAP tear surgery (shoulder arthroscopic surgery) on Dec 2014..Now I am perfectly already and he treats the patients very wise and reply with patience to all our questions. I always prefer to all my friends ..***** **** ************* *********** * *******
Thank you

review: Doctor was quite cool and listens to the problem patiently. Overall a good experience. But the fee which they collected was different from the one which they mentioned here. Do give proper information about your profile in the practo. I have enquired with the receptionist there, she said it all depends on the seriousness of the issue. What kind of a response is this.
reply_text:
The fee was changed recently. We tried to change it ourselves but it was not working,so we informed Practo people to change it. But they had not changed it. That is why the difference in fees. However, the practo people have changed it now.

Regards

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctor is not more of outspoken in explaining us the issue. Clinic looks neat and clean the expectancy is to get a proper billing which does not exist.
reply_text: In the present pandemic situation, we are exposing ourselves to very high chances of contracting infection. To minimise the risk, we cannot spend more contact time with patients and their relatives. Probably that’s what made you unhappy. As for billing, we give a proper bill.  We wish you could have informed us of these issues when you were in the clinic, giving us a chance to explain our side of the story. Every thing said and done, it makes us sorry that you had a negative experience with us.
